attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call upon the Secretary of State for Digital Media And Sport (Matthew Hancock MP) along with Ofcom and the Charities Commission to establish through the means of a public inquiry the veracity of these allegations and amend public policy according to the conclusion drawn.
attributes.background: In a recent documentary entitled Panodrama a number of disturbing allegations were brought to light regarding the journalistic practices of the BBC and a charity called Hope Not Hate.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because BBC programmes or services are the responsiblity of the BBC, which is independent of the UK Government or Parliament.

You can complain to the BBC here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/faqs/complaints_process

If you would like a public inquiry into allegations of BBC bias you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234797
